body_html:
Thanks @soumith for your quick response! :)

Just had a try. Faster on new address, now it is about 100 KB/s.
Still not on the mirror in China.

I'm not sure about the mirror structure. If the command is like this:
pip install pytorch
or
conda install pytorch
it can be synchronized by the mirror sites.
Because the package is too big, it is worth doing this.
Thanks!

body:
Thanks @soumith for your quick response! :)

Just had a try. Faster on new address, now it is about 100 KB/s. 
Still not on the mirror in China. 

I'm not sure about the mirror structure. If the command is like this:
pip install pytorch
or 
conda install pytorch
it can be synchronized by the mirror sites. 
Because the package is too big, it is worth doing this.
Thanks!
